snippet: One family’s story illustrates how war, displacement and currency collapse have upended a professional class that was proportionally one of the Arab world’s largest.
abstract: War and failing economy have upended Syria's professional class, which was proportionally one of the largest in the Arab world; description of hardships faced by one family noted.
lead_paragraph: One family’s story illustrates how war, displacement and currency collapse have upended a professional class that was proportionally one of the Arab world’s largest.

headline.main: A Two-Doctor Family’s Prosperity and Routine Are Shaken by War
headline.print_headline: A Two-Doctor Family’s Prosperity and Routine Are Shaken by War
